amendment.description: An amendment numbered 127 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds from being used to impose a COVID-19 mask mandate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.
